messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/goauth2

LGTM

https://codereview.appspot.com/7070051/diff/1/oauth/example/oauthreq.go
File oauth/example/oauthreq.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7070051/diff/1/oauth/example/oauthreq.go#newcode92
oauth/example/oauthreq.go:92: // Write the response to standard output.
the old comment position was better, before the io.Copy.

The defer should be as close to possible to the acquisition of the resource., right after the err check.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/goauth2/source/detail?r=b3e86ec424d3 ***

goauth2: clean up example

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7070051

https://codereview.appspot.com/7070051/diff/1/oauth/example/oauthreq.go
File oauth/example/oauthreq.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7070051/diff/1/oauth/example/oauthreq.go#newcode92
oauth/example/oauthreq.go:92: // Write the response to standard output.
On 2013/01/08 00:07:05, bradfitz wrote:
> the old comment position was better, before the io.Copy.
> 
> The defer should be as close to possible to the acquisition of the resource.,
> right after the err check.

Done.

subject: code review 7070051: goauth2: clean up example
